abstract: United Nations Human Rights Council narrowly passes initiative aimed at increasing protection for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people; measure, inspired by Orlando nightclub massacre, draws opposition from several members on religious and cultural grounds.
lead_paragraph: The Human Rights Council, over the objections of Muslim and Arab nations, approved measures to strengthen protections for gay, bisexual and transgender people.

headline.main: U.N. Panel Moves to Curb Bias Against L.G.B.T. People
headline.print_headline: Over Objections, U.N. Panel  Moves Against L.G.B.T. Bias

snippet: The Human Rights Council, over the objections of Muslim and Arab nations, approved measures to strengthen protections for gay, bisexual and transgender people....

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
